name: MFX Services
description:
MFX is a boutique IT services provider for U.S.-based P&C insurance carriers, reinsurers and agents. Combining its own insurance software IP and partnerships, it provides services to insurers across the entire insurance value chain on their preferred choice of platform and delivery mechanisms. MFX has a strong presence in the U.S. P&C midmarket and currently processes 2.7 billion in force premiums in a SaaS model.
Its service portfolio includes business and technology consulting services, a platform as a service solution, hybrid cloud and infrastructure solutions (including cybersecurity), core insurance platform implementation and integration, as well as P&C industry BPO services. MFX works with multiple Tier 1 technology partners, particularly the leading cloud-hosting companies, as well as insurance-focused partners such as FirstBest Systems (now Guidewire), Duck Creek Technologies, First Gen, and Instec. MFX's goal is to "become P&C's go-to digital" partner by providing end-to-end services that leverage strong capabilities in PaaS, infrastructure as a service (IaaS), application, and BPO (robotics, analytics, mobility and GRC) services, with a specific focus on data management solutions and external partner integration solutions.
